content.en: Immune-cancer connection: Scientists have been using algorithms to investigate the relationship between immune cells and cancer prognosis. By analyzing gene expression data, these algorithms can identify patterns and networks of genes that are associated with immune infiltration in different types of cancer. This research aims to understand the role of these networks in tumor progression and to potentially develop new biomarkers for predicting patient outcomes.
content.da: Immunkræft-forbindelse: Forskere har brugt algoritmer til at undersøge forholdet mellem immunceller og kræftprognose. Ved at analysere genekspressionsdata kan disse algoritmer identificere mønstre og netværk af gener, der er forbundet med immuninfiltration i forskellige typer kræft. Denne forskning sigter mod at forstå disse netværks rolle i tumorudvikling og muligvis udvikle nye biomarkører til at forudsige patienternes udfald.
